CustomField.description: reciprocal tax amount conversion from dollars to text
CustomField.formula: IF(FIND('.', TEXT(Tax_Amount__c)) = 0, TEXT(Tax_Amount__c) + '.00', (LEFT(TEXT(Tax_Amount__c), FIND('.', TEXT(Tax_Amount__c) ) ) ) + RPAD(RIGHT(TEXT(Tax_Amount__c), LEN(TEXT(Tax_Amount__c)) - FIND('.', TEXT(Tax_Amount__c) ) ), 2, '0') )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: this field is a conversion of tax amount from dollars to text for use in reports
CustomField.label: Tax Amount TXT
